subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James had 20 points and 12 assists, and Antawn Jamison scored 18 points in his first start for Cleveland as the Cavaliers beat the visiting New Orleans Hornets.
snippet: LeBron James had 20 points and 12 assists, and Antawn Jamison scored 18 points in his first start for Cleveland as the Cavaliers beat the visiting New Orleans Hornets.
